tier1.name: platinum
tier1.description: Our Tidal Wave Social Media Tier Offers the ability to have our Social Strategy Experts get hands on, creating and implementing a multi stage Social Strategy to improve your reach and engagement with your target market

tier2.name: gold
tier2.description: Our Rogue Wave Social Media Tier Offers the creation of a Social Strategy Plan where one of our experts creates a Social Schedule and helps you integrate it into your business

tier3.name: basic
tier3.description: Our Surface Wave Social Media Tier Offers a Social Strategy session with one of our experts in the field of Social Content, Brand Integration and Online Prescence

tier1.name: platinum
tier1.description: Our Tidal Wave Video Tier Offers Professional Level Commercial Production in which we Concept, Pre-Produce, Build a team, Shoot, Edit and Deliver. Shoot time ranges and Delivery can be expedited.

tier2.name: gold
tier2.description: Our Rogue Wave Video Tier Offers Production on a Concept we develop with you, we Pre-Produce, Shoot, Edit and Deliver. Usually 1-2 Day Shoot - 1 Week Delivery

tier3.name: basic
tier3.description: Our Surface Wave Video Tier Offers Production on an Concept you have come up with, in which we shoot, edit and Deliver. Usually 1 day shoot - 5 Day Delivery

tier1.name: platinum
tier1.description: Our Tidal Wave Web Development Tier Offers The Best of Both worlds as our team of professional designers work with our developers to design and implement a Custom Website for your business and work directly with you to make sure your website has all the functionality and appeal you need to stand out in your industry

tier2.name: gold
tier2.description: Our Rogue Wave Web Development Tier Offers Either Design Concepting and Creation to be integrated into your website or a Custom Website built around designs you have already created

tier3.name: basic
tier3.description: Our Surface Wave Web Development Tier Offers Either a basic design concepting session for your company website or a modular website build of a design you have already created
